examples: Happy birthday! Let's celebrate with a party.
She received many gifts on her birthday.
Feliz aniversário! Vamos comemorar com uma festa.
Ela recebeu muitos presentes no aniversário dela.

suggested: Why did the birthday cake go to school? Because it wanted to be a smartie-pants!
Sometimes, birthdays can be a reminder of the passage of time and make us reflect on our lives.
Why do some people always forget my birthday? It makes me so angry!
Did you know that the world record for the most candles blown out on a birthday cake is 72?
The aroma of freshly baked cake and sweet icing that fills the air during a birthday celebration.
The feeling of unwrapping a birthday gift and holding it in your hands, filled with anticipation.
Birthdays are a time for gathering with loved ones, celebrating milestones, and strengthening connections with family and friends.
